name: ShapedData
desc: A collection type that represents multidimensional data in a data frame element.

items.name: init(shape: [Int], strides: [Int], contents: [Element])
items.desc: Creates a multidimensional shaped array from a one-dimensional array.

items.name: let contents: [Element]
items.desc: A linear array that stores the elements of the multidimensional array.

items.name: let shape: [Int]
items.desc: An integer array that stores the size of each dimension in the corresponding element.

items.name: let strides: [Int]
items.desc: An integer array that stores the number of memory locations that span the length of each dimension in the corresponding element.

items.name: subscript(Int...) -> Element
items.desc: Retrieves an element using an index for each dimension.
